name: Kingscape
description:
This chess inspired game was made during a Game Jam that our team attended.

Download it and have fun!

Team Lead and Programmer: Abel Varalungović

Programmers: Darijan Bogdanović, Nino Potrkač

3D Models: Petra Stojičić
